description: Take a step off the beaten path with the newest iteration of their high-cushion trail cruiser, The Timp 4. Ready for any adventure, the Timp 4 is made to take on the trails with features like our grippy MaxTrac™ outsole and upgraded Altra EGO™ MAX midsole designed to keep you going. This iteration’s improved fit is designed for better performance on any trail, any ground, any terrain.
name: Altra Timp 4 - Mens
